name: Life is ticking
description:
You are visiting a mysterious planet as the famous "Olli the planet explorer". But something is odd, the time moves way to fast! Only your trusty rewind-gun can rewind the time of the living organisms on this world.

The game is divided into multiple levels for Olli to explore with many different features.

Controlls:

-Move with Arrow-Keys

-Press [1] to use your rewind-gun

-Press [2] to use your whip
